data.title: Tell IT ALL! Omarion Announces 5 Part Docuseries About B2K Drama
data.meta_description: Omarion announces the release of his new docuseries 'Omega'.  In the five-part docuseries Omarion speaks his truth  on the B2K situation with ex-band members.
data.text:
Omarion drops trailer to five-part docuseries spilling all the beans on B2K drama. Since the recent Verzuz battle with Omarion people can not stop thinking about, " what happened to B2K?".

Omarion promises in the docuseries he will share openly about all the B2K issues that has the band still at odds today. His former bandmembers all took to social media to vent their unpleasant comments on the release of the docuseries throwing mad shade. Lil Fizz, J-Boog, and Raz B will be watching with the rest of the world Omarion's breaking his silence on B2K issues. The docuseries 'Omega' drops on July 21st.

Photo: Getty Images

Video: Youtube hiphopisreal.com
